data.title: Explore Our Luxury Vacation Investment Properties
data.meta_description: Equity Residences makes vacation home ownership an affordable and financially attractive investment. Explore the Equity Platinum Fund luxury vacation investment properties.
data.text:
Explore the Equity Platinum Fund 2

Equity Residences is redefining vacation home ownership by making them an affordable and financially attractive investment. Our latest offering, the Equity Platinum Fund 2, plans to purchase exclusive residences in Hawaii, California, the Caribbean, and other highly coveted vacation destinations. The Fundâ€™s objective is to raise $50 million to acquire up to 16 multi-million dollar luxury vacation investment homes in locations that offer world-class services and amenities, such as ski-in ski-out, beachfront location, and access to private clubs, golf courses and more.
